name: Kiro the Kosmonaut
description:
Embark on a journey through the solar system and prove that you have what it takes to reach Pluto in one piece! You'll visit planets, pass the asteroid belt, evade obstacles while managing your fuel and health !

Kiro the Kosmonaut is a casual space-themed platformer game and is the 1st ever game created by VelikoStudio - your indie game dev friend

Features of the game:

Vibrant low-poly graphics

20 levels with increasing difficulty

Different pickups that affects the gameplay - fuel jerry cans, power boosts and health packs

Different enemies and obstacles - asteroids, meteors, comets, planes and more...

Easy controls, one-handed play

How to play:

"Space" -  Main engine

"Q" and "E" - RCS thrusters

"A" and "D" - move left and right
